text: Mayhem could mean: *Mayhem, a type of crime *Mayhem, an influential black metal band *Mayhem, an album by English rock group Toyah *Mayhem, a Marvel Comics character *Mayhem, a professional wrestler *Mayhem in Monsterland, a Commodore 64 video game *TV Mayhem, a television show that aired for six weeks beginning in September 1991 *WCW Mayhem, a World Championship Wrestling event, which has a video game based on it: **WCW Mayhem *Mayhem Attack Squad, a team of Decepticons *Mayhem (Lady Gaga album), the seventh studio album by American singer Lady Gaga (2025) == Related pages == *Methods of Mayhem, an American rap metal band formed by ex-Mötley Crüe drummer, Tommy Lee *Minstrels of Mayhem, an American Renaissance Festival music group *Michigan Mayhem, a minor league basketball team in the Continental Basketball Association *Dr. Teeth and The Electric Mayhem, a Muppet rock band that appeared on The Muppet Show *Ani-Mayhem, an anime-based collectible card game *Jason "Mayhem" Miller, a Mixed Martial Arts fighter *Monica Mayhem, an Australian pornographic actress
title: Mayhem
